radiographic_examinations.findings: Slightly increased echogenicity of the liver suggesting fatty infiltration, no focal hepatic lesions or masses, no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilation, gallbladder with a large amount of sludge mixed with tiny, echogenic shadowing stones, some impacted within the gallbladder neck, gallbladder wall measuring up to 4 mm, small amount of pericholecystic fluid, CBD measuring up to 6 mm without definite choledocholithiasis, sonographic Murphy's sign absent.
